comment.author: 23206131@N06
comment._content: Luna Park was part of Coney Island: "A fire started in the Pneumatic Tube and Miniature Subway in Luna Park on December 11, 1911. A combination of low winds and a working high pressure fire fighting system saved the park. Attractions burned were the Pneumatic Tube, Checker Slide, and the Temple of Mystery all on the east side of the main walk. Loss was $125,000." from this website: www.westland.net/coneyisland/articles/1900.htm
